summary: VEHICLE SMELLS LIKE GASOLINE WHILE STATIONARY AND IN MOTION.  VEHICLE HESITATES TO START AND THEN FINALLY STARTS. CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WILL STAY ON FOR A SECOND OR TWO THEN GO OUT.   TOOK VEHICLE TO TWO INDEPENDENT SERVICE PLACES AND THEY VERIFIED THAT THE FUEL IS LEAKING FROM THE OUTLET FLANGE SIMILAR TO THE RECALL ON 2010 JAGUAR XF VEHICLES.
